document_data.mainbody:
Hickoyrdale was a small village located in the kingdom of Callidyrr on the island of Alaron within the Moonshae Isles.
Hickorydale sat in the shadow of the Dernall Forest on the southern edge of the Drowned Forest. The village was located along a trail that branched off of the High Kings Road in the county of Stagford in central Callidyrr.
